message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper discusses methods for continual learning in artificial neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning. Specifically, the paper focuses on evaluating and comparing different methods for continual learning in three different scenarios. Given this focus, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) since these sub-categories are closely related to the topic of machine learning. The paper also mentions the use of regularization-based approaches and replaying representations of previous experiences, which are techniques commonly used in neural networks and could place the paper in the sub-categories of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
